titles.title: For the relief of Vernadette Bader.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 5/17/2006--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay Vernadette Bader, of Taylor, Michigan, a specified sum as compensation for an erroneous calculation made by the National Labor Relations Board (NLRB) in the distribution of funds from a specified employment discrimination settlement.
